channel.title: idols on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in idols on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Dreaming Through ´Ka´
item.description: The author seems to be trying to achieve the effect of time all being one moment. The effect of this hits the reader in full force in the end when it goes back to Garuda, who was last mentioned in the first chapter reading the Rg Veda, waking up from a light doze on the word ‘Ka’.

item.title: Dialogues II
item.description: S: In response to your questions: What is relativism? It’s the philosophical position that all points of view are equally valid and that all truth is relative to the individual.

item.title: Dialogues I
item.description: I have a friend who I found last September after nearly 9 years of no contact. We initially had no idea that we would become close again.
